overview: 1000+1 days after the outbreak of a pandemic, a group of strangers are forced to live together and establish a fake company STUDIO TATH. Through it they deliver online daily classes and performances, where they try to convince the audience and themselves that every day is Monday and they will finally manage to live a normality. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: STUDIO TATH
